title: 1988년 Frith 사건
summary: 미국 Alabama, AL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Frith. 판결일: 1988-04-12. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Alabama.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Johnny Hugh FRITH v. STATE
**판결일**: 1988-04-12
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Alabama
**관할**: Alabama, AL

**판사**: Tyson

## 인용

- 526 So. 2d 892

## 판결문 요약


TYSON, Judge.
This cause is reversed and remanded for a new trial on.authority of Ex Parte Frith, modified on rehearing March 18, 1988, 526 So.2d 880 (Ala.1988).
REVERSED AND REMANDED.
All the Judges concur.
